doc:
Anthony Caruso (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anthony_Caruso_(actor) 0 Anthony Caruso (April 7, 1916 – April 4, 2003) was an American character actor in more than one hundred American films, usually playing villains, including the first season of Walt Disney's Zorro as Captain Juan Ortega. Anthony_Caruso ( April_7_,_1916 – April_4_,_2003 ) was an_American_character_actor in more_than_one_hundred_American_films , usually playing villains , including the_first_season of Walt_Disney 's_Zorro as Captain_Juan_Ortega .
